title: Meatzza
description: I find this more and more helpful in the repertoire as so many children – small children at any rate – seem to be kept on strict wheat-free diets by their parents these days. This is why I’ve given the option of replacing the breadcrumbs with porridge oats, and very well it works, too. All in all, it is just about the perfect children’s tea.
ingredients: 3 tbsp breadcrumbs or porridge oats (not instant)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
1 x 125g/4½oz ball mozzarella (not buffalo), halved, then sliced
